QuestData.Title: In Search of Aluwyn
QuestData.Description: There's something sinister going on within this place, $n. We fear that the rumors of the Twilight's Hammer in Blackfathom Deeps are true.$B$BI sent Sentinel Aluwyn, one of our best scouts, further in to investigate the matter, but she hasn't returned.$B$BSeek her out. If she's still alive, find out all that she's learned.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Sentinel Aluwyn at Blackfathom Deeps.
QuestData.RewardText: Ashelan was good to send you. There is indeed a wicked plot underway in this corrupted place.
